Content:
In another thread concerning a "salvage" title, I mentioned crashedtoys.com (where the insurance claims end up). Just for the heck of it, I did a search on BMW S1000R. The results were kind of interesting. Some had quite a few years and miles on them, but an awful lot of them were only a year or two old, with very low miles:

https://www.crashedtoys.com/lotSearchResults?free=true&query=bmw%201000
